oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Luttrell. Col. James Churchill Luttrell.

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. James Churchill Luttrell (March 2, 1813 - July 6, 1878). Taken by C.C. Griers, Artist, 43 & 45 Union Street, Nashville, Tenn. From the Laura E. Luttrell Papers, folder 770.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Cartes de visite;
